AUDIO
NARRATOR : (OFF SCREEN)
And a third (COVER FINAL THIRD OF
SCREEN) at tasks which could be done
efficiently by professional assistants or
technical devices.
72. MS. NARRATOR ON SCREEN NARRATOR : (SYNC) This same mind-set
BY MODEL OF TYRANNO¬
SAURUS REX. makes it hard for us to free our secondary
teachers from the repetitive teaching of
specialized subject matter. Countless
precious hours are wasted. . . as this able
specialist. . .
DISSOLVE TO:
73. MS. HIGH SCHOOL HISTORY
TEACHER AT DESK TALK¬
ING.
(HE LOOKS UP. )
CUT TO:
74. MS. CLASS.
MATCH DISSOLVE TO:
75. MS. CLASS. . . AS OBVIOUSLY
DIFFERENT CLASS MEMBERS
FILE IN.
NARRATOR: (OFF SCREEN) Like each
of his colleagues. . .attempts to duplicate
his. . .
NARRATOR : (OFF SCREEN)
. . . skilled performance. . .
. , . for standard section. . .
NARRATOR: (OFF SCREEN) After
standard section. . .
